PHP Manual

hw_api_error->count

(PHP 4, PHP 5 < 5.2.0, PECL hwapi SVN)

hw_api_error->count — Returns number of reasons

Description

int hw_api_error::count ( void )

Returns the number of error reasons.

Return Values

Returns the number of errors, as an integer.

See Also

  • hw_api_error->reason
